Convicted sex offender Cody Young ‘hunted’ young girls on Waikato streets https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/convicted-sex-offender-cody-young-hunted-young-girls-on-the-streets-of-the-waikato/IQWQ7X6P7FAODCM6OIIHDDKFM4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/convicted-sex-offender-cody-young-hunted-young-girls-on-the-streets-of-the-waikato/IQWQ7X6P7FAODCM6OIIHDDKFM4/ Belinda FeekHe used promises of cash to get them into his vehicle. Two fought against him and escaped. Thu, 07 Dec 2023 06:00:00 +0000 Sex offender Cody Allen Young, of Waitoa, was on an extended supervision order when he tried to kidnap young girls off the streets of Hamilton and Huntly earlier this year. Photo / Belinda Feek
